verses.text: \w This|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scroll|strong="H5612"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dictation|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*:

“\w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*:

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* said, ‘Woe \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w added|strong="H3254"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w pain|strong="H4341"\w*! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w worn|strong="H3021"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* groaning \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w*.’”

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Baruch:\f + \fr 45:4 \ft Literally Thus you shall say to him:\f* “\w This|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w Throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* demolish \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w uproot|strong="H5428"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5315"\w*? Stop \w seeking|strong="H1245"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H1320"\w* \w creature|strong="H5315"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* war.”
